Title:
Colletotrichum karstii causes anthracnose on Cattleya
walkeriana in Brazil
Abstract:
Colletotrichum karstii is reported for the first time
causing anthracnose on the native Brazilian orchid Cattleya walkeriana.
Identification was verified by a combination of the analysis of
morphological and molecular features. A pure culture was obtained and a
conidial suspension prepared from this pure culture was inoculated on
healthy plants and KochÂ’s postulates were fulfilled confirming the
pathogenicity of C. karstii to C. walkeriana.
